verses.verse: And in that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> women <S%H802><s%> shall take hold <S%H2388><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> We will eat <S%H398><s%> our own bread, <S%H3899><s%> and wear <S%H3847><s%> our own apparel: <S%H8071><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> let us be called <S%H7121><s%> by thy name, <S%H8034><s%> to take <S%H622><s%> away our reproach. <S%H2781><s%>

In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall the branch <S%H6780><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> beautiful <S%H6643><s%> and glorious, <S%H3519><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be excellent <S%H1347><s%> and comely <S%H8597><s%> for them that are escaped <S%H6413><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that he that is left <S%H7604><s%> in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and he that remaineth <S%H3498><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> shall be called <S%H559><s%> holy, <S%H6918><s%> even every one <S%H3605><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> among the living <S%H2416><s%> in Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%>

When <S%H518><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> shall have washed away <S%H7364><s%> <S%H853><s%> the filth <S%H6675><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and shall have purged <S%H1740><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> from the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> thereof by the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of judgment, <S%H4941><s%> and by the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of burning. <S%H1197><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will create <S%H1254><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> dwelling place <S%H4349><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> her assemblies, <S%H4744><s%> a cloud <S%H6051><s%> and smoke <S%H6227><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> and the shining <S%H5051><s%> of a flaming <S%H3852><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> by night: <S%H3915><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> shall be a defense. <S%H2646><s%>

And there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a tabernacle <S%H5521><s%> for a shadow <S%H6738><s%> in the daytime <S%H3119><s%> from the heat, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2721><s%> and for a place of refuge, <S%H4268><s%> and for a covert <S%H4563><s%> from storm <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2230><s%> and from rain. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4306><s%>
